benefits.name: Social Security
benefits.description: Provides financial support for retirees, disabled individuals, and survivors of deceased workers.
benefits.eligibility: Individuals aged 65 or older or with disabilities.
benefits.application_process: Apply online via the Social Security website or in person at a local office.

benefits.name: Medicare
benefits.description: Health insurance for people aged 65 and older or younger people with certain disabilities.
benefits.eligibility: Available for those aged 65 or older or with qualifying disabilities.
benefits.application_process: Apply through the Medicare website or during open enrollment periods.
